commits.helpText: Gets the URL to see this project's commits.

contributors.helpText: Gets the URL to see the contributors to this project.

credits.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's credits.

dotafreeheroes.helpText: Lists the current free hero rotation in DOTA2.

getchar.helpText: Gets a Unicode character from a character code.
Gets the instance ID of the current ServerConnector instance.

issues.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's GitHub Issues.

license.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's LICENSE.

me.helpText: Send an emote as the bot.

pullrequests.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's pull requests.

reconnect.helpText: Disconnect and reconnect to the current server.

reload.helpText: Reloads the bot without shutting down.

sendalert.helpText: Manually send an alert to all alert channels.

source.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's source code on GitHub.

trello.helpText: Gets the URL to this project's Trello page.

uptime.helpText: Tells you how long the bot has been running.

version.helpText: Tells you what version the bot is running on.
